Model Roundtable Orchestrated Discussion
Arena Discussion Agents Variations Confessions
Let models debate before answering

Pick any mix of local or API models and have Qwen 2.5 orchestrate a structured, turn-based discussion before returning the final takeaways.

  • Select participants, orchestrator model, and number of rounds.
  • Watch each turn stream in real time with reasoning from every model.
  • Use debates to stress-test tricky problems or compare reasoning styles.

Configure the roundtable

Choose which models will participate and who orchestrates the debate.
